reviews.review_msg: My main reason for taking this class with D. Ha were all the good reviews she got on here but I was disappointed. The class felt very disorganized. The assignments' requirements were changed multiple times. The lectures felt like they were not rehearsed and most of the weeks were not connected with the weekly readings. Would not recommend.

Dr. Ha is the most genuine prof you will ever get at SFU. She is super accessible outside of class and is very responsive to emails. Her course outlines are fair, and will often amend assignments and tests to ensure all her students can succeed. As long as you like reading research and want a good prof, you'll love any class with her.

I loved Dr. Ha's class! She's so genuine and it's obvious that she cares about her students. She gives great feedback and was really accessible outside of class. It was necessary to do the readings in order to actively participate in class discussions - which were always lively and engaging.

This was a seminar class, and so participation is everything- But Dr. Ha made it so easy to express your own thoughts and opinions. She genuinely cared for all her student's success and was extremely approachable with everything. If you take a class with her you literally won't regret it. Hoping to have another course with her soon!
